actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend certain provisions of section 8344 of title 5, United States Code, which relate to the employment of retired Federal civil servants as congressional employees.

summary.text: Prohibits charging against the allowance, appropriation, or other fund from which a congressional employee is paid the amount such employee's salary is decreased by reason of the fact that such employee is receiving a Federal pension.

titles.title: A bill to amend certain provisions of section 8344 of title 5, United States Code, which relate to the employment of retired Federal civil servants as congressional employees.
